home.hero_title: Sustainable Mobility for Students, Young Professionals and Workers
home.hero_subtitle: Mugixor - Born in Basque Country, Designed for Europe
home.hero_description: Accessible and reliable electric transport solutions for your daily life. Electric bikes, electric scooters and more, specially designed for students, young professionals and workers across Europe - from London to Berlin, Paris to Amsterdam.
home.sustainability_desc: We reduce urban emissions with every journey, contributing to cleaner cities across Europe from Basque Country to major European capitals.
home.quality_desc: Reliable and durable products, designed for daily use by students and workers in European cities.
home.innovation_desc: Accessible technology that really works, without unnecessary complications.
home.local_focus_desc: Born in Basque Country, serving students and workers in London, Paris, Berlin, Amsterdam, and major European cities.

products.title: Electric Transport for Students and Workers Across Europe
products.description: Discover our complete range of electric vehicles: electric bikes, electric scooters and sustainable mobility solutions, specially designed for students, young professionals and workers in major European cities including London, Manchester, Birmingham, Paris, Lyon, Berlin, Munich, Amsterdam, Rotterdam and more.
